TwinEditor.UI.IApplicationView

TwinEditor.UI.IApplicationView Interface Reference

Provides a view for the top-level application information, provided by the ApplicationContext. More...

Detailed Description

Provides a view for the top-level application information, provided by the ApplicationContext.

Member Function Documentation

ISessionView TwinEditor.UI.IApplicationView.CreateNewSession ( IFileType  fileType  ) 

Creates a new session view using the provided file type.

Parameters:
fileType The file type to be initially used for this session.
Returns:

Implemented in TwinEditor.UI.ApplicationViewForm.

void TwinEditor.UI.IApplicationView.DisplayError ( string  message,
Exception  exception 
)

Display an error with the given message and depending on application settings possibly with the exception provided to the user.

Parameters:
message The text message, giving a user-friendly description of the error.
exception The exception that caused the error, giving more insight to developers about what exactly happened.
void TwinEditor.UI.IApplicationView.Show (  ) 

Makes sure the view is currently visible to the user.

void TwinEditor.UI.IApplicationView.UpdateRecentFiles ( List< String >  recentFiles  ) 

Used to update this view when the rcently used files have changed.

Parameters:
recentFiles The recent files opened by the user.

Property Documentation

ApplicationContext TwinEditor.UI.IApplicationView.ApplicationContext [get, set]

The ApplicationContext that provides data and behavior for this view.

Implemented in TwinEditor.UI.ApplicationViewForm.

ICommunicationProtocol [] TwinEditor.UI.IApplicationView.CommunicationProtocols [get, set]

Sets or gets the communication protocols that this application supports.

This should be set by the ApplicationContext object.

Implemented in TwinEditor.UI.ApplicationViewForm.

IFileType [] TwinEditor.UI.IApplicationView.FileTypes [get, set]

Gets or sets the IFileTypes that are available in this application.

This should be set by the ApplicationContext object.

Implemented in TwinEditor.UI.ApplicationViewForm.
